moreinfo:
Volume 3 contains the gaiden "Gunbu Matsuri" (軍部祭り, The Military Festival).; Gangan Powered 2002-Spring

Volume 4 contains the gaiden "Gun no Inu?" (軍の犬?, Dog of the Military?).; Gangan Powered 2002-Autumn

Volume 7 contains the gaiden "Tatakau Shoui-san" (戦う 少尉さ, The Second Lieutenant Goes to Battle!).; Gangan Powered 2003-Autumn

Volume 8 contains the special prologue chapter to PS2 game "Hagane no Renkinjutsushi: Tobenai Tenshi Prologue" (鋼の錬金術師 翔べない天使 prologue, Fullmetal Alchemist and the Broken Angel Prologue).

Volume 14 contains the short chapter "Omake no Elric-ke" (おまけのエルルック家).

Volume 23 contains the special prologue chapter to Wii game "Hagane no Renkinjutsushi: Akatsuki no Ouji Prologue" (鋼の錬金術師 FULLMETAL ALCHEMIST －暁の王子－Prologue, Fullmetal Alchemist and the Prince of the Dawn Prologue).

Volume 24 contains the special prologue chapter to Wii game "Hagane no Renkinjutsushi: Tasogare no Shoujo Prologue" (鋼の錬金術師 FULLMETAL ALCHEMIST －黄昏の少女－Prologue, Fullmetal Alchemist and the Daughter of the Dusk Prologue).

Volume 27 contains the gaiden "Mou Hitotsu no Tabiji no Hate" (もうひとつの旅路の果て, Another Journey's End).; Shounen Gangan 2010-10
